name: Chinese 5000 Words with Pictures
description: Application:  Chinese 5000 Words with Pictures  is the easy and fun new way to learn Chinese, You can learn vocabulary by seeing an images to illustrate words, with audio support phonetic transcriptions and pronunciation recordings by native speakers.  Its offline and free .No more boring when learning Chinese, vocabulary. Have fun and learn Chinese, vocabulary as easy as possible. Give it a try and download now !  Features:   The entire vocabulary has been translated into 89 languages:  Afrikaans  Albanian  Amharic  Arabic  Azerbaijani  Belarusian   Bengali  Bosnian  Bulgarian  Catalan  Chinese  Traditional Chinese  Croatian  Czech  Danish  Dutch  Estonian  Tagalog  Chinese  Chinese   Georgian  Chinese  Greek  Hebrew  Hindi  Hungarian  Icelandic  Igbo  Indonesian  Irish  Chinese  Chinese  Kazakh  Chinese  Latvian   Lithuanian  Macedonian  Malay  Mongolian  Nepali  Chinese  Persian   Polish  Chinese  Brazilian Chinese  Romanian  Chinese  Serbian   Slovak  Slovenian  Chinese  Swahili  Chinese  Thai  Turkish  Ukrainian  Urdu  Chinese etc.  Quality audio pronunciation and images.  No internet connection required while learning (offline).  There are many mini games for you, playing game to learn Chinese .  Add all your new vocabulary to Reminder, it will remind you to learn your Chinese vocabulary daily  Commonly-used Chinese vocabularies  100% Free: No limitations of content or functions in an attempt to make you buy a paid version.
